definition: tweezers/forceps/nippers/pliers/to nip/to pick up with tweezers/to pluck out

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Each book carving was made using sharp knives , tweezers, and scissors .
sentences.chinese: 每一本书雕都是借助锋利的刀片，镊子和剪刀完成的。

sentences.english: If you have naturally thick eyebrows just tweeze a little and thank the lord you have such lucky genes!
sentences.chinese: 如果你的眉毛很浓，就可以用镊子拔掉一些。

sentences.english: The scissors and the basins and the spoons and the fire-trays, of the best gold;
sentences.chinese: 又用精金制造镊子，盘子，调羹，火鼎。

sentences.english: The doctor quickly and very carefully picked them up one by one with tweezers.
sentences.chinese: 医师就很小心用镊子，把那些虫一只一只的夹起来。

sentences.english: I use tweezers to manipulate the paper shapes.
sentences.chinese: 我时常借助镊子来搞定这些造型。

sentences.english: A scalpel and tweezers are the only tools needed.
sentences.chinese: 只需备有解剖刀和镊子。

sentences.english: Using tweezers immerse cotton pellet in medication.
sentences.chinese: 使用镊子浸泡棉球在服药。

sentences.english: Using tweezers, they preserved each piece between sheets of glass.
sentences.chinese: 他们用镊子把每一页放入玻璃片中保存。

sentences.english: A large molecule have been brought using a optical tweezer which can move as measurement requirement.
sentences.chinese: 光镊子能镊住大分子，按照测量要求进行操作。

sentences.english: Unwrap & remove the pinkies with tweezers, be careful not to handle them & leave your own scent on them.
sentences.chinese: 使用镊子抓取乳鼠，不要让气味留在你的受上。

sentences.english: There's also a tweezer and toothpick and a hole for lanyard attachment.
sentences.chinese: 还有一个镊子和牙签和一个系绳的接孔。

sentences.english: Tweezers were the most popular item that men borrowed, followed closely by moisturizers.
sentences.chinese: 镊子是男人最常借用的物件，润肤霜紧随其后。

sentences.english: The tweezers' subject is anti-too type which is not easy to let objects off.
sentences.chinese: 镊子的主体为不容易让对象物飞散的防过软型。

sentences.english: You would need a tweezer to tease out the hairs on one side.
sentences.chinese: 你需要一把镊子来把头发梳到一边。

definition: variant of 棉籤|棉签[mian2 qian1]/cotton swab
tweezers/forceps/nippers/pliers/to nip/to pick up with tweezers/to pluck out
